desc: Welcome to the online home for the illustrated children's picture book, "Little Mr. Fix It Assists With The To-Do List." The book is accompanied by a line of stationery for kids, activity sheets, and games that teach kids about handyman tools. Support early childhood literacy and diverse literature for kids ages 3-8.

layout.text: Welcome to Little Mr. Fix It's World
Where family time is dedicated to working together to develop responsibility and skills for early literacy.
